description:
Samoan Passage Moored Profiler Data Archive. Please note that the copy here on zenodo contains only the GitHub repository, data are stored elsewhere.

Head to https://github.com/gunnarvoet/sp-data-archive-mp for instructions on how to clone the full dataset or download data files manually at https://osf.io/7b8fn/.
title: Samoan Passage Moored Profiler Data Archive
